title: Ecostream user's dashboard
tasks: In charge of creating the interactive prototypes for the analytic tool
Responsible for developing the final tool connecting with the live data
projectDescription: The project was designed by Edenspiekermann for the energy company Eneco
It shows several analytic tools to monitor the production of energy by household equipped with solar panels
The initial phase was focused on prototyping the navigation through the data, moving from year to month, week and day
The data was held by a third-party company, therefore the final product was developed in order to connect with the API of this company's services
team: Interaction and visual design: Nick van der Linde
AS3 development: Brian Heylin and myself
